name: part_002
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠・夜公演】SorAZ Major Debut Live『First Gravity』【 #SorAZGravity 】【ホロライブ ⧸ ときのそら ⧸ AZKi 】 [7oFSKRxKu7A]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: A list of donors and participants for the SorAZ Major Debut Live is displayed on screen with upbeat background music.
Promotional clips for AZKi's musical works, including 'Sanmaime no Chizu', 'Tokyo Shandy Rendezvous' (Cover), and 'Sincerely' (Cover).
Promotional clips for Tokino Sora's musical works, including 'STAR STAR☆T' and 'Kawaikute Gomen' (Cover).
Promotional clips for SorAZ's album 'Futurity Step' and merchandise for the live concert.
A digest of performances from the SorAZ Major Debut Live 'First Gravity', featuring various songs and snippets of the concert.

subtitles.original: 差し入れを贈ってくださったそらとも・開拓者の皆様、本当にありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: To all the Soratomo and Pioneers who sent us gifts, thank you so much!

subtitles.original: AZKi メジャーデビューEP「3枚目の地図」好評配信中！
subtitles.english: AZKi's Major Debut EP "Sanmaime no Chizu" is now available on streaming platforms!

subtitles.original: AZKi 「トウキョウ・シャンディ・ランデヴ」(Cover) 配信中！
subtitles.english: AZKi's cover of "Tokyo Shandy Rendezvous" is now available on streaming platforms!

subtitles.original: AZKi 「Sincerely」(Cover) 配信中！
subtitles.english: AZKi's cover of "Sincerely" is now available on streaming platforms!

subtitles.original: ときのそら 2024年3月6日(水) Release Mini Album「STAR STAR☆T」リリース決定！
subtitles.english: Tokino Sora's Mini Album "STAR STAR☆T" will be released on Wednesday, March 6, 2024!

subtitles.original: ときのそら 歌ってみた「可愛くてごめん」配信中！
subtitles.english: Tokino Sora's cover of "Kawaikute Gomen" is now available on streaming platforms!

subtitles.original: SorAZ メジャーデビューアルバム「Futurity Step」好評配信中！
subtitles.english: SorAZ's Major Debut Album "Futurity Step" is now available on streaming platforms!

subtitles.original: Major Debut Live「First Gravity」CD物販限定特典
subtitles.english: Major Debut Live "First Gravity" CD Sales Limited Bonus

subtitles.original: バイバイ・テクノロジー
subtitles.english: Bye-bye technology

subtitles.original: こんな思考もホコリ出して
subtitles.english: Dumping out all these thoughts

subtitles.original: 空っぽみたいに
subtitles.english: As if I'm empty

subtitles.original: 愛し合いたいだけなのに
subtitles.english: Even though I just want us to love each other

subtitles.original: くらっときた瞬間 私のなかで
subtitles.english: The moment I felt dizzy, inside of me

subtitles.original: きっと宇宙が始まったんだ
subtitles.english: Surely the universe had begun

subtitles.original: なぜか惹き付けられるよう だけど
subtitles.english: It's like I'm being drawn in for some reason, but

subtitles.original: 瞬きするたびに見失ってばかりで
subtitles.english: I keep losing sight every time I blink

subtitles.original: 予測ができない ナチュラル・アモルファス
subtitles.english: Unpredictable natural amorphous

subtitles.original: 私のレンズじゃ 捉えられないけれど
subtitles.english: Even though I can't capture it with my lens

subtitles.original: 惑わすあなたと出会いたいな
subtitles.english: I want to meet you who confuses me

subtitles.original: 迷わず行けたら 遠くの星は
subtitles.english: If I could go without hesitation, the distant stars

subtitles.original: いつでも眩しくて 私を導いて
subtitles.english: Would always be dazzling, guiding me

subtitles.original: 微笑んでるの
subtitles.english: And smiling

subtitles.original: もっと近づきたくて
subtitles.english: I want to get closer

subtitles.original: あなたを知りたくて
subtitles.english: I want to know you

subtitles.original: 星影に私 触れちゃったみたい
subtitles.english: It's like I've touched the starlight

subtitles.original: 探して やっと見つけて
subtitles.english: Searching, finally found you

subtitles.original: どうして こんなに接近しても
subtitles.english: Why, even when I get this close

subtitles.original: まだ重力反転
subtitles.english: Is gravity still reversed?

subtitles.original: 駆け引き 上手ね 無邪気なプラネット
subtitles.english: You're good at bargaining, you innocent planet

subtitles.original: わがままで願うばかりじゃ
subtitles.english: If I only keep wishing selfishly

subtitles.original: きっと離れちゃうんだね いつか
subtitles.english: We'll surely drift apart someday

subtitles.original: 私を惑わす星よ
subtitles.english: Oh, star that confuses me

subtitles.original: 惑わすあなたと出会いたいな
subtitles.english: I want to meet you who confuses me

subtitles.original: 迷わず行けたら
subtitles.english: If I could go without hesitation

subtitles.original: 遠くの星は
subtitles.english: The distant stars

subtitles.original: いつでも眩しくて 私を導いて
subtitles.english: Would always be dazzling, guiding me

subtitles.original: 微笑んで
subtitles.english: Smiling

subtitles.original: 惑わすあなたを攫いたいな
subtitles.english: I want to snatch you away who confuses me

subtitles.original: 迷わず言えたら
subtitles.english: If I could say it without hesitation

subtitles.original: 遠くの星は
subtitles.english: The distant stars

subtitles.original: いつでも優しくて 私は導かれ
subtitles.english: Would always be kind, and I'd be guided

subtitles.original: 微笑んでるの
subtitles.english: Smiling

subtitles.original: ずっと近づきたくて
subtitles.english: I want to get closer forever

subtitles.original: あなたを知りたくて
subtitles.english: I want to know you

subtitles.original: 星影に私 触れちゃったみたい
subtitles.english: It's like I've touched the starlight
